description:
Thriller Company sabotages the race for a sacred treasure, and the displaced Straw Hats must pull an all-nighter to rebuild their shrine and score some ancient gold!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: De retour à l’époque féodale ! Un piège à déjouer ! Le plan de la Thriller Company
Feudal Era Side Story: Defeat Thriller Company`s Trap
Il piano della Thriller Company viene sventato
Jidaigeki Tokubetsu Hen: Yabure! Thriller Shoukai no Wana
時代劇特別編 破れ! スリラー商会の罠
